titles: A letter of syr Tho. More knyght impugnynge the erronyouse wrytyng of Iohn Fryth agaynst the blessed sacrament of the aultare
author: More, Thomas, Sir, Saint, 1478-1535.
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
keywords: Lord's Supper --  Real presence --  Early works to 1800.
